#id=1
#text=I love reading books , and once I finished all my books in the library , I decided that I needed new books .
#id=2
#text=The best place in my neighborhood for getting new books for free was the local library .
#id=3
#text=To borrow from the library , all you needed was a simple library card .
#id=4
#text=I walked to the local library and went to my favorite section of the library .
#id=5
#text=The history section had my favorite books about Napoleon .
#id=6
#text=Once I found my favorite book , I took it with me and brought it over to the check outline .
#id=7
#text=I waited in line until it was my turn .
#id=8
#text=I gave the librarian my book and library card and they checked it out for me .
#id=9
#text=I was given a receipt and a date to return the book .
#text=I had three weeks to finish the book before I had to go back and return it .
#text=When I left the library , the security checked my receipt and my books and allowed me to leave .
